Detailed Description

Handles communication via uart (polling mode).

void uart_puts ( const char *  s  ) 

Display string on rs232.

The strings are saved on flash and not in sram. See here definition of DEBUG_PUTS on freebus-debug.h.

Parameters:
s String pointer which points to flash

References uart_putc().
